participant_1.background:
I visit craft websites to learn about new sewing projects and video game websites to find new games to play.
I'm a strong woman who can handle anything life throws my way.
I like to learn about the world, but I do not always listen to my doctor.
I love spending time outdoors, whether I'm taking pictures of nature or riding my horses.
I once went to the Amazon rainforest, where I encountered a tribe that had never heard of sweet potatoes.

participant_2.background:
I used to be a teacher like my mom, but I found that I prefer working with animals more.
i love to write stories while sitting in the grass in my back yard.
I enjoy watching my son play football and I like to make sure that things are done right, even if it means redoing them over and over again.
My passion is writing but my spelling is terrible, I'm still learning.
when things go wrong , i do everything i can to make it right.

content.text: Hey there, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to write stories, but I'm still learning to spell correctly.
That's cool, I used to write a lot too. I also enjoy learning about the world and I like to spend time outdoors.
Oh wow, I'm actually a bit of a nature nerd myself. I love to go on hikes and explore new places. I also enjoy taking pictures of nature.
That's great! I've always wanted to go on a hike in the Amazon rainforest. Do you have any good stories from your time there?

Yes, I actually have a few! One of my favorite stories is about the time I encountered a tribe that had never heard of sweet potatoes. I was so excited to share this new food with them and they were just as excited to try it.
That's such a cool story! I'm so glad you had the opportunity to share something new with them.
Me too! It was a really special experience.
I'm sure it was. Thanks for sharing it with me!
No problem! It was fun talking to you!
